title: At 84, Poet Gary Snyder Lives In 'This Present Moment'
teaser: Poet Gary Snyder has hung with the Beats, studied Buddhism, worked as a logger and he's still going strong. He talks with NPR's Linda Wertheimer about his new collection, This Present Moment.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
